The British Council Scholarship, IELTS Award, 2024 is offered for Bachelors, Masters Degree in the field of any subject offered by the Universities. Applications are invited from interested candidates to apply for the scholarship. The deadline for the scholarship application is 10 Jun 2024. This scholarship is Partially Funded from £3,000 up to a maximum of £10,000.

Summary

Beneficiary:        Bachelors, Masters to study any subject offered by the universities

Available:          Open to all nationals

Organization:     British Council

Deadline:          30 June 2024

Funding:           Partial Funding, Provides from £3,000 up to a maximum of £10,000

Test Location:    Can be taken in any country

Eligibility for British Council – IELTS Award, 2024:

  • The applicants should be 18 years of age or above on 30 June 2024.
  • Applicant must have taken an IELTS test at a British Council center in Germany and must have gotten an official Test Report Form (TRF) issued by the British Council and the TRF should be dated between 2 June 2024 and 10 June 2024.
  • A minimum overall band score of 6.5, plus a minimum score of 6.5 in each of the four components of the IELTS test must be achieved by the student.
  • The university must be accepting IELTS as part of its admission requirements and the tuition fees of the programme of choice must be a minimum of £3,000 for one academic year.
  • Applicants must also be able to provide an acceptance letter from the relevant educational organization by 31 July 2024.

How to Apply British Council Scholarship Award, IELTS Award, 2024:

  • Goto https://www.eventsforce.net
  • Click Apply
  • Provide your details
  • Review and Submit.

Documents required:

Candidates applying should be able to submit the letter of acceptance from the relevant educational organization by 31 July 2024 at the latest.

Value:

The recipient of the IELTS Award 2024 will get a minimum of £3,000 up to a maximum of £10,000.

Deadline for British Council Scholarship Award, 2024

The last date to apply is 30th June 2024 (14:00, German time)
